abstract: The jobs are to be eliminated over the next year as Sun awaits a takeover by Oracle.
snippet: The jobs are to be eliminated over the next year as Sun awaits a takeover by Oracle.
lead_paragraph: Sun Microsystems, waiting for European regulators to approve its acquisition by the Oracle Corporation, plans to cut as many as 3,000 jobs, or about 10 percent of the work force, to pare expenses over the next 12 months.

headline.main: Sun to Cut 10 Percent of Its Workers
headline.print_headline: Sun to Cut 10% Of Its Workers
